Report / series: Provisional monthly measles and rubella data
Description: Measles cases are defined as laboratory confirmed, epidemiologically linked, and clinical cases as reported to the World Health Organization. Some countries report cases at irregular intervals, providing multiple months of data in a one month period. Future months are reported as 0 and will be updated as data is available
Daily gridded min and max temperature
Immunization coverage by antigen (country, regional, and global trends)
